title: New H&FJ catalog
content:
Just visited the [Hoefler and Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220031427/http:/www.typography.com/) website to see if Chronicle was up for sale, and it is, along with a revamped website. Noticed the have a new print catalog for free. Also noticed they are now offering OpenType versions of several of their fonts—Gotham, Whitney, Didot,etc.

 [‹ calligraphy for left-handed](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220031427/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36802 "Go to previous forum topic") [Black (Death) Metal typography ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220031427/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36731 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adnix

comments.content: Looks great! And, I like Chronicle. Have you seen Rearden, a custom editorial type designed by Dino dos Santos? Nice!
I am liking the new site - it’s easier to use and clearer.
Great new site but they still charge a different fee per computer, which seems crazy to me.
